name: Dynetzzle Extended
description: Dynetzzle is an original number puzzle game based on the features of a standard six-sided die.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 65 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Good, but complicated until you find a system that works for you.
This game is like an advanced version of Sudoku. It's great and genious!!
Excelent game, that I completed. Difficulty is increasing with each level. This game helps develop abstract thinking.
